nodes.text: Compressed baryon canisters were a type of canister. In 7957 C.R.C., a compressed baryon canister was used to smuggle the NM-K reconstitutor used by terrorist Letta Turmond during the bombing of the Jedi Temple hangar on the planet Coruscant. Following the completion of the investigation into the bombing, Coruscant Security Force Inspector Tanivos Divo was given access to the canister used by Turmond.
Compressed baryon canisters were first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
